ModMetaData.name: Thrumbo Husbandry
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
Thrumbo Husbandry
This mod is intended to make raising Thrumbo's easier. The following has been changed:
Petness of 0.85, mate every 8 hours, and nuzzle every 6 was added to Thrumbos. Hunger rate was reduced freom 3.5 to 1.5. Wildness was reduced from .95 to .5. Gestation period reduced from 60 days to 15 days. Min age to become an adult was reduced from 4 years to .25 years. Carnivore was added to food type and Vegetable was removed so they now eat everything but you live plants. ;)
